text: Prunus cercocarpifolia is a species of Prunus found in the Chihuahuan Desert, in the south of the Mexican state of Coahuila. Judging from its morphology, it is closely related to Prunus microphylla. When initially collected, Eupelmid wasps were found within the pits.https://plants.jstor.org/stable/10.5555/al.ap.specimen.ansm041542 ==References== cercocarpifolia Category:Flora of Coahuila Category:Endemic flora of Mexico Category:Plants described in 1989 Category:Drought-tolerant plants
title: Prunus cercocarpifolia
